_source.text: A few days later, Andrejs sent me a test pressing of the choir's latest Christmas CD, Latvian Winterfest on Albany, and oh holy night, it might be as good or even better than the last one.

text: Winterfest on **Albany**, and oh holy **night**, it might be as good or even **better** **than** the last one.

_source.text: #4-at least its a beginning-learn a lot thru these simple jobs-show up on time-dress / personal hygiene-etc etc -albany high school has hugh drop at rate--these jobs for them.. better than being on welfare and sleeping late in morning after being up half the night smoking 9/00/pack cigs.
